text: To be honest I don't think I'm convinced of basically any of the big lines in behavioral neuroscience. I worked for several years in a reputed institution dedicated to learning and memory. I learned a bit there, but the biggest take-away I got from that job was lasting cognitive dissonance about how much money these people were operating with compared to how absolutely _blase_ they were about the reproducability of their results.
